objective: Review and organize v0.3.0 milestone items - identify 10 most impactful, verify issue descriptions, create missing sub-issues

work_completed.description: Analyzed 29 v0.3.0 milestone issues for impact ranking
Assigned issue #990 (Memory Enhancement Layer Epic) to v0.3.0 milestone
Verified all 10 top-impact issues have accurate descriptions with PRD links, acceptance criteria, and dependencies

work_completed.recommendation: Start with Option A (Decision Matrix Documentation) as non-breaking approach

work_completed.description: Launched background agents to create sub-issues for epic breakdown

agents.task: Create 4 sub-issues for #990 phases (Citation Schema, Graph Traversal, Health Reporting, Confidence Scoring)
Create 5 sub-issues for #739 phases (Command Design, Agent Tiers, Command Scripts, Auto-docs, Testing)
agents.comment_added: Summary comment added to Epic #739 with dependency graph

decisions.decision: Identified top 10 most impactful v0.3.0 items based on priority, scope, dependencies, and business value
decisions.rationale: Epics (#990, #739) rank highest due to strategic scope. MCP infrastructure (#582-592) is P0 foundational work. Memory fragmentation (#751) blocks memory enhancement work.
decisions.alternatives_considered: Could have prioritized by technical complexity or estimated effort, but impact and dependencies provide better delivery sequencing

decisions.decision: Recommended Option A (Decision Matrix) for #751 memory fragmentation
decisions.rationale: Non-breaking change that can inform future consolidation. Provides immediate value without migration risk.

outcomes.milestone_expanded: 29 â†’ 38 issues (9 new sub-issues for epics)

epic_tracking_complete.#739: 5 phases tracked (#1000, #1002, #1003, #1004, #1005) - sub-issues linked via gh sub-issue

next_actions: Monitor v0.3.0 milestone progress using new phase tracking
Use sub-issues for detailed implementation planning
Reference comprehensive cross-links when questions arise

memory_updates.reason: Document the impact analysis and ranking methodology for v0.3.0 milestone planning
